sentences.english: In the case of non-Euclidean geometry he published no definitive work.
sentences.chinese: 至于非欧几里德几何，他没有发表过权威性的著作。

sentences.english: Euclid requires no prior study of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 读欧几里德不需要先研究数学。

sentences.english: The common conclusion was the uniqueness and necessity of Euclidean geometry .
sentences.chinese: 欧几里德几何的唯一性与必要性已被公认。
